title: Fort Smith National Historic Site: Places
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Places               Places                   First Fort Smith               Federal Courthouse                Second Fort - Commissary               Frisco Train Station         Â     First Fort Smith  Fort Smith was established at the confluence of the Arkansas and Poteau Rivers in 1817 .  Second Fort - Commissary The Commissary, one of the city's most iconic landmarks, is the oldest building in Fort Smith.  Federal Courthouse First built as a military barracks, it was later converted for use as a courthouse and jail.  Frisco Train Station Completed in 1904 was a grand and imposing structure for its time.
